beer.beer_description:
One of Australia’s first certified organic beers, Steam Ale is not your average craft beer.
This brew is inspired by traditional steam beers, which are lagers brewed at warm, ale temperatures. We turned this technique on its head by brewing an ale at a cool, lager temperature, and landed at the same result. 
Our Steam Ale is exactly what the original steam beer brewers set out to achieve: a crisp, refreshing beer that doesn’t compromise on character.

Our Steam Ale is exactly what the original steam beer brewers set out to achieve: a crisp, refreshing beer that doesn’t compromise on character.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 2!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 90 check-ins with a photo.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 50 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 11! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: This is nostalgic af for me. Steam ale + combo laksa on a stinking hot Melbourne night. Nothing better! Roll me home!

items.badge_description: Round round get around, you get around. Get around round round you get around. Ooh-ooh! That’s 5 different beers from 5 different countries in a row.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 1 year on Untappd!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 10 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 10 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 3!
